## storageArc() function

A utility function to wait until a player's storage arc matches a desired storage arc for a DNA

**Signature:**

```typescript
storageArc: (player: PlayerApp, dnaHash: DnaHash, storageArc: DhtArc, intervalMs?: number, timeoutMs?: number) => Promise<void>
```

</th><th>

Description

</td><td>

</td><td>

A Player.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

dnaHash


</td><td>

DnaHash


</td><td>

The DNA to check the storage arc for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

storageArc


</td><td>

DhtArc


</td><td>

The desired storage DhtArc to wait for.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

intervalMs


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Interval between comparisons in milliseconds (default 500).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

timeoutMs


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Timeout in milliseconds (default 40\_000).


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;

A promise that resolves when the player's storage arc matches; rejects on timeout.
